page.title: 16Playground Games. Part 2.
page.content: In the playground we also play marbles. Marbles are round things,like footballs but smaller.They have different colours in them like the colours of the rainbow. Each person has a marble and the first player rolls it and the second must try and hit it. If he does then he is allowed to keep it. There are many sizes of marbles. The largest is called Grandad Bulgies and the smallest, Cat's Eyes.Another game that we play is Football. What you have to do is place the ball in the net with your feet. You are not allowed to touch the ball with your hands. A person called the 'Goalie' tries to stop you from putting the ball in the net.The winner is the person who can put the most balls in the net. Football is an international sport.
